Note: The user/PT initially skipped the instructions , their initial instinct was just put on the glasses. They also had trouble identifying the button on the glasses and to visualize where the LED screen would blink from .
The user/ PT also had trouble identifying the power button of the band. But with assistance , we were able to get the device setup.
Device setup was done in about 12 min.
The user / PT had difficulty with some of the hand gestures. They had to go through the tutorials again.
Even with the volume turned all the way up , they had difficulty hearing possibly they must have had some hearing loss.
The user / PT mentioned they would have preferred to have the screen in the glasses centered.

The user / PT mentioned they felt a bit of uneasiness with the glasses but that wasn't the case when they were focused on something with the glasses eg playing a game , making a call. They said “uneasy” to do with the screen not being so clear especially with the different backgrounds.
I noticed the user / PT would occasionally adjust the glasses as though it was slipping off their nose bridge.
Mentioned the glasses were a bit heavy,
